title: International Symbol Mark for wheel chair be installed in a lift, toilet, staircase, parking areas, etc
clause_text: International Symbol Mark for wheel chair be installed in a lift, toilet, staircase, parking areas, etc., that have been provided for the differently abled Road Intersections, Median Refuge, Traffic Signals, Subways & Foot over Bridges

source_pdf.text_snippet: International Symbol Mark for wheel chair be installed in a lift, toilet, staircase, parking areas, etc., that have been provided for the differently abled
